basics.name: Yi Tian
basics.summary: MSc in Biomedical Informatics at National University of Singapore. Research interests include AI for Healthcare, Computational Pathology, and Multimodal Medical AI.

publications.name: Direction-Guided Watershed for Adherent Cell Instance Segmentation
publications.summary: First-author. Proposed DDBD and OAWA modules to build a direction-guided watershed framework.

publications.name: CellMamba: Adaptive Mamba for Accurate and Efficient Cell Detection
publications.summary: First-author. Introduced Full Mamba into detection backbone for multi-scale attention fusion.

publications.name: Advancing Cross-Organ Domain Generalization With Test-Time Style Transfer and Diversity Enhancement
publications.summary: Co-author. Research on domain generalization for medical imaging.

publications.name: BiF³-Net: A Full BiFormer Full-scale Fusion Network for Accurate Gastrointestinal Images Segmentation
publications.summary: Co-author. Fusion network for gastrointestinal image segmentation.

publications.name: Convolutional Neural Network-Based Identifying Gender of Kiwifruit Flowers in Autonomous Pollination for Future Farming
publications.summary: First-author. CNN-based gender identification for flowers in autonomous farming.

publications.name: Transcriptionally Controlled De Novo Molecular Generation through Hierarchical Gene Encoding and Adaptive Feature Modulation
publications.summary: Co-author. Research on de novo molecular generation.

publications.name: KPMamba: Token-Level Semantic Alignment for Pose Estimation
publications.summary: First-author (Co-first). Research on semantic alignment for pose estimation.

publications.name: Semantic Alignment in Medical Data: A Survey
publications.summary: First-author (Co-first). A systematic review of semantic alignment in multimodal medical AI.
